00022 /**

00024  * @author Chuck Sugnet

00026  * 
00027  * @brief  Interface for methods computing SNP genotyping calls.
00028  */
00029 #ifndef QUANTGTYPEMETHOD_H
00030 #define QUANTGTYPEMETHOD_H
00031 
00032 //
00033 #include "chipstream/BioTypes.h"
00034 #include "chipstream/QuantExprMethod.h"
00035 #include "chipstream/QuantMethod.h"
00036 #include "chipstream/QuantMethodReport.h"
00037 //
00038 #include <cstring>
00039 #include <string>
00040 //
00041 
00042 /**
00043  * Quantification methods used for making genotyping calls implement (currently
00044  * just brlmm) this interface.
00045  */
00046 class QuantGTypeMethod : public QuantMethod {
00047 
00048 public:
00049   virtual ~QuantGTypeMethod();
00050 
00051   /** 
00052    * How many genotyping calls do we have? Also indicates how many
00053    * samples there are.
00054    *
00055    * @return Number of genotyping calls made.
00056    */
00057   virtual size_t getNumCalls() = 0;
00058   
00059   /** 
00060    * Get the genotype call at specified index (sample).
00061    * @param index - sample of interest.
00062    * @return - Genotyping call made.
00063    */
00064 
00065   virtual affx::GType getGTypeCall(unsigned int index);
00066 
00067   virtual affx::GType getGTypeForcedCall(unsigned int index);
00068 
00069   /** 
00070    * Get the genotype call at specified index (sample).
00071    * @param index - sample of interest.
00072    * @return - Genotyping call made.
00073    */
00074 
00075   virtual int getForcedCall(unsigned int index);
00076 
00077   /** 
00078    * Get the genotype call at specified index (sample).
00079    * @param index - sample of interest.
00080    * @return - Genotyping call made.
00081    */
00082 
00083   virtual int getCall(unsigned int index);
00084 
00085   /** 
00086    * Get our confidence value for a particular call in a particular sample.
00087    * @param index - sample of interest.
00088    * @return - Confidence in the predicted call.
00089    */
00090   virtual double getConfidence(unsigned int index) = 0;
00091 
00092   /** 
00093    * Get our confidence value for a particular call in a particular sample.
00094    * @param genoType -  Genotype of interest.
00095    * @param index - sample of interest.
00096    * @return - Confidence in the predicted call.
00097    */
00098   virtual double getConfGenotype(affx::GType  genoType, unsigned int index) = 0;
00099 
00100   /** 
00101    * Get the summary value after transformation for the A and B alleles respectively.
00102    * 
00103    * @param index - Which chip to get values for.
00104    * @param aValue - Filled in with transformed a value.
00105    * @param bValue - Filled in with transformed b value.
00106    */
00107   virtual void getAlleleValues(unsigned int index, double &aValue, double &bValue) = 0;
00108 
00109   /** 
00110    * Get the summary value names for the A and B alleles respectively.
00111    * 
00112    * @param aName - Filled in with a value name.
00113    * @param bName - Filled in with b value name.
00114    */
00115   virtual void getAlleleValueNames(std::string &aName, std::string &bName) = 0;
00116 
00117   /** 
00118    * Get the name of the probeset that these calls are being made for. 
00119    * @return name of probeset.
00120    */
00121   virtual const std::string &getProbeSetName() = 0;
00122 
00123   /** 
00124    * Get a string representation for a particular SNP.
00125    * @return - a string version of a SNP
00126    */
00127   virtual std::string getModelString();
00128 
00129   /**
00130    * Get the max value for a call
00131    */
00132   virtual double getMaxThresh() = 0;
00133 
00134   /**
00135    * Get the min value for a call
00136    */
00137   virtual double getMinThresh() = 0;
00138 
00139   /** 
00140    * Add an expression reporter to output the summary values for each
00141    * allele, residuals, etc.
00142    * 
00143    * @param reporter - the object that will output all summary values.
00144    */
00145   virtual void addExprReporter(QuantMethodReport *reporter) = 0;
00146 
00147   virtual std::string getModelFile() {
00148       APT_ERR_ABORT("Model file not suppored.");
00149       return "";
00150   }
00151 
00152 protected:
00153   /** clear a probe set*/
00154   void clearProbeSet(ProbeSet &ps); 
00155 
00156   /** fill in the probe set with the allele values */
00157   bool fillInAlleleProbeSets(const ProbeSet &gtPs, ProbeSet &aAllele, ProbeSet &bAllele); 
00158 
00159   /** summarize this allele */
00160   bool summarizeAllele(ProbeSet *pSet,
00161                        std::vector<double> &summaryValues,
00162                        const IntensityMart &iMart,
00163                        std::vector<ChipStream *> &iTrans, 
00164                        PmAdjuster &pmAdjust, 
00165                        QuantExprMethod *quantMethod,
00166                        bool lowPrecision,
00167                        bool doReport, 
00168                        std::vector<QuantMethodReport *> reporters);
00169 
00170   /** summarize this allele - no reports */
00171   bool summarizeAllele(ProbeSet *pSet,
00172                        std::vector<double> &summaryValues,
00173                        const IntensityMart &iMart,
00174                        std::vector<ChipStream *> &iTrans, 
00175                        PmAdjuster &pmAdjust, 
00176                        QuantExprMethod *quantMethod,
00177                        bool lowPrecision);
00178 
00179   bool extractProbes(std::vector <std::vector <double> > &probeIntensity, 
00180                      ProbeSet *pSet,
00181                      std::vector< unsigned int > &probeIds,
00182                      const IntensityMart &iMart, 
00183                      std::vector<ChipStream *> &iTrans, 
00184                      PmAdjuster &pmAdjust, 
00185                      bool lowPrecision, 
00186                      QuantExprMethod *quantMethod); 
00187   
00188   bool canSetUpProbeSet(const ProbeSet* gtPs);
00189 
00190 protected:
00191   std::vector<affx::GType> m_Calls;
00192   const ProbeSet *m_GtProbeSet; ///< Genotyping probeset currently using.
00193   std::string m_ProbesetName; ///< Name of current probeset.
00194   ProbeSet m_Aallele; ///< Probeset to detect the A allele
00195   ProbeSet m_Ballele; ///< Probeset to detect the B allele
00196   std::vector<double> m_AValues;  ///< Our summarized values for A allele intensity
00197   std::vector<double> m_BValues;  ///< Our summarized values for B allele intensity
00198 };
00199 
00200 #endif /* QUANTGTYPEMETHOD_H */
